name: Crazy Racing City - Car Speed
description:
Fast car speed racing is a super crazy 3D action racing game. Burn up calories in the city with the fastest and most exhilarating 3D racing game. You can drive your car and race in the city with the fast speed and the most exciting controlling!Have fun dodging cars and trucks while you speed up to the limit. High fidelity graphics with addictive gameplay,Tilt your device left or right to change highway lanes that when you and the traffic passing get higher score, and exceed other racers off the road.
Features:
-Breathtaking visuals and amazing cars
-More coins to unlock and upgrade
-Customize your cars
-More racing scence to choose
-HD graphics
